# Oroud Backend Project - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Production-ready NestJS backend for "Oroud" application with PostgreSQL, Prisma ORM, and clean architecture.

## Technology Stack
- NestJS with TypeScript
- PostgreSQL database
- Prisma ORM
- Docker for local development
- JWT authentication (prepared)

## Project Structure
```
src/
  modules/     - Feature modules
  common/      - Shared utilities
  config/      - Configuration files
  prisma/      - Prisma schema and migrations
```

## Development Status
- ✅ Project scaffolded
- ✅ Modules: Auth, Users, Shops, Offers, Cities, Reports, Admin
- ✅ Global validation and error handling configured
- ✅ Docker setup complete
